testsuite.name: com.Jio.JioIndex
testsuite.system-out:
TS_MOB_001 :: To verify user can login into jio application, verify dashboard, current jio plan and perform recharge for a friend.
Step 1 : Click on close button to skip introduction.
Validation Message : Introduction screen skipped already.
Verify user can see Home Screen of "Jio Application " with following fields
1. Mobile Tab.
2. JioFiber Tab.
3. Jiofi Tab.
4. JioLink Tab.
5. Enter mobile number text field.
6. Generate OTP button.
7. Login with QR.
8. Not a jio user Button.
Pass
Mobile Number - 8200042508
Step 2 : Click on Generate OTP button.
Step 3 : Click on Close "Explore Now" advertisement.
4. Verify user is redirected to dashboard of My jio application after successful login. .
Logged in user Number : - 8200042508
Registered user number : - 8200042508
Pass
Step 4 : Click on telecom Tab.
Verify user can see telecom tab screen.
Logged in user Number : - 8200042508
Registered user number : - 8200042508
Pass
Current Plan Amount : - 599
Current Plan Data : - 2
Step 5 : Click on Current Plan button.
Verify current plan screen with its details present.
Current Plan Details : - Rs599- 3m- 2GB/Day
Total SMS : - 100 SMS
Remaining SMS : - remaining of 100 SMS/Day
Remaining Data Left : - 2 GB
Voice - Non Jio : - 2214.00 Min
Unlimited Omnet : - Unlimited
Pass
Step 6 : Click on back button from current plan details screen.
Verify user is redirected to telecom screen, after user clicks on back button from current plan screen.
Logged in user Number : - 8200042508
Registered user number : - 8200042508
Pass
Step 7 : Click on Menu button.
Verify user can see Menu Screen.
User Name : -
Pass
Step 8 : Click on Recharge for a friend.
Verify user can see recharge for a friend screen.
Pass
Mobile Number - 111694
Step 9 : Click on Proceed Button.
Verify user can see validation message for "Please enter a valid Jio Number"
Pass
Step 10 : Click on Back button from recharge for a friend screen.
Step 11 : Click on Menu button.
Step 12 : Click on Settings Button.
Step 13 : Click on Logout Button.
Verify user can see Logout Popup.
Pass
Step 14 : Click on Yes Button.
Verify user is logged out successfully.
Pass
